translated: When it is destroyed into shards, the mind does not engage in the conception of a pot.

original: gang zhig gis blo chos gzhan bsal na de'i blo mi 'jug pa de yang kun rdzob tu yod par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: gang zhig gis blo chos gzhan bsal na de'i blo mi 'jug pa de yang kun rdzob tu yod par rig par bya ste /
translated: That which is not cognized by that mind when another phenomenon is mentally dissected from it should be understood to be conventionally existent,

original: dper na chu lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na chu lta bu'o //
translated: like water, for example.

original: de la ni blos gzugs la sogs pa'i chos bsal na chu'i blo mi 'jug go //
analyzed: de la ni blos gzugs la sogs pa'i chos bsal na chu'i blo mi 'jug go //
translated: When the phenomenon of form, etc., is mentally dissected from it, the mind does not engage in the conception of water.

original: de dag nyid la kun rdzob kyis ming der 'dogs pas kun rdzob kyi dbang gis bum pa dang chu yod do zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: de dag nyid la kun rdzob kyis ming der 'dogs pas kun rdzob kyi dbang gis bum pa dang chu yod do zhes brjod pa na /
translated: When it is said that a pot and water exist by the power of the conventional,

original: bden ba nyid do zhes brjod kyi brdzun pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: bden ba nyid do zhes brjod kyi brdzun pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: it is said that they are truths, not that they are false.

original: de las gzhan pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste /
translated: The other is the ultimate truth.

original: gang zhig bcom yang rung blo chos gzhan bsal yang rung /
analyzed: gang zhig bcom yang rung blo chos gzhan bsal yang rung /
translated: When it is destroyed or when another phenomenon is removed by the mind,

original: de'i blo 'jug pa de ni don dam pa nyid du yod de dper na gzugs lta bu'o //
analyzed: de'i blo 'jug pa de ni don dam pa nyid du yod de dper na gzugs lta bu'o //
translated: the cognition of it does not cease, it exists ultimately, like form, for example.

original: de na rdul phra rab tu bcom la blos gzugs la sogs pa'i chos bstsal yang /
analyzed: de na rdul phra rab tu bcom la blos gzugs la sogs pa'i chos bstsal yang /
translated: When form is destroyed into subtle atoms and the phenomenon of form is removed by the mind,

original: gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi blo ni 'jug pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi blo ni 'jug pa nyid do //
translated: the cognition of the nature of form does not cease.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: The same should be applied to feeling and so on.

original: de dag ni don dam par yod pas na don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ni don dam par yod pas na don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: Since they exist ultimately, they are ultimate truths.

original: bden pa rnams bshad zin to //
analyzed: bden pa rnams bshad zin to //
translated: The truths have now been explained.

original: ji ltar na de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: ji ltar na de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba brjod par bya ste /
translated: How does one see them?

original: tshul gnas thos dang bsam ldan pa //
analyzed: tshul gnas thos dang bsam ldan pa //
translated: One who is established in morality, who possesses learning and reflection,

original: bsgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor //
analyzed: bsgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor //
translated: is well-prepared for meditation.

original: bden pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pas dang bo nyid du tshul @214b khrims srung bar byed do //
analyzed: bden pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pas dang bo nyid du tshul @214b khrims srung bar byed do //
translated: One who desires to see the truths first of all observes morality.

original: de nas bden pa mthong ba dang mthun pa'i thos ba 'dzin pa'am don nyan par byed do //
analyzed: de nas bden pa mthong ba dang mthun pa'i thos ba 'dzin pa'am don nyan par byed do //
translated: Then, in order to see the truths, he retains what he has heard or listens to the meaning.

original: thos nas phyin ci ma log par sems par byed do //
analyzed: thos nas phyin ci ma log par sems par byed do //

original: bsams nas bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag la rab tu sbyor te /
analyzed: bsams nas bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag la rab tu sbyor te /

original: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab la brten nas bsams pa las 'byung ba'i shes rab skye'o //
analyzed: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab la brten nas bsams pa las 'byung ba'i shes rab skye'o //

original: bsams pa las 'byung ba la brten nas bsgoms pa las byung ba skye'o //
analyzed: bsams pa las 'byung ba la brten nas bsgoms pa las byung ba skye'o //

original: shes rab de dag gi mtshan nyid kyang ci zhe na /
analyzed: shes rab de dag gi mtshan nyid kyang ci zhe na /
translated: What are the characteristics of these wisdoms?

original: thos sogs byung ba blo yi yul //
analyzed: thos sogs byung ba blo yi yul //
translated: The object of the mind is that which arises from hearing, etc.

original: ming dang don dang gnyi ga'o //
analyzed: ming dang don dang gnyi ga'o //

original: ming la dmigs pa ni thos ba las byung ba'i shes rab bo zhes grag go //
analyzed: ming la dmigs pa ni thos ba las byung ba'i shes rab bo zhes grag go //

original: ming dang don gnyi ga la dmigs pa ni bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab ste /
analyzed: ming dang don gnyi ga la dmigs pa ni bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab ste /
translated: The wisdom born of reflection has as its object both the name and the object.

original: res 'ga' ni yi ges don 'dren bar byed do //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni yi ges don 'dren bar byed do //

original: res 'ga' ni don gyis yi ge 'dren par byed do //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni don gyis yi ge 'dren par byed do //

original: bsgoms pa las byung ba ni don la dmigs pa nyid de de ni yi ge la mi brten par don la 'jug go //
analyzed: bsgoms pa las byung ba ni don la dmigs pa nyid de de ni yi ge la mi brten par don la 'jug go //
translated: The wisdom born of meditation has only the object as its object, for it engages the object without relying on the letter.

original: yang de ltar bsgoms pa la rab tu brtson pa de ji ltar na bsgoms pa rdzogs ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang de ltar bsgoms pa la rab tu brtson pa de ji ltar na bsgoms pa rdzogs ba yin zhe na /

original: smras pa / bsrings gnyis ldan /
analyzed: smras pa / bsrings gnyis ldan /

original: gal te lus dang sems gnyis kyis bsrings pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te lus dang sems gnyis kyis bsrings pa yin te /

analyzed: 'du 'dzi dang mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thag bsrings pa las so //

original: 'o na bsrings pa de gnyis kyang su zhig la bya bar sla ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na bsrings pa de gnyis kyang su zhig la bya bar sla ba yin zhe na /

original: 'dod pa chung ba dang chog shes pas bya bar sla'i chog mi shes pa dang / 'dod chen can la ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa chung ba dang chog shes pas bya bar sla'i chog mi shes pa dang / 'dod chen can la ma yin no //
translated: The opposite of the first two is easy to do, because of having few desires and being content. But it is not easy for the discontented and the greedy.

original: yang chog mi shes pa de ni gang zhig yin /
analyzed: yang chog mi shes pa de ni gang zhig yin /

analyzed: chos mngon pa ba dag ni chos gos la sogs pa bzang bo rnyed pa dang / yang dang yang du 'dod pa ni chog mi shes pa'o //

analyzed: ma rnyed pa de dag 'dod pa ni 'dod chen can no zhes grags go //

analyzed: bzlog ba de yi gnyen po ste // chog mi shes pa dang 'dod chen las bzlog pa ni de dag gi gnyen por rig par bya ste /

original: de gnyis khams gsum gtogs dri med //
analyzed: de gnyis khams gsum gtogs dri med //

original: de'i gnyen po zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: de'i gnyen po zhes bya bar sbyar te /

original: gsum dag dang mi ldan ba na yod do //
analyzed: gsum dag dang mi ldan ba na yod do //

analyzed: chog mi shes pa dang 'dod chen can ni 'dod pa na spyod pa nyid do //

analyzed: yang chog shes pa dang 'dod pa chung ba 'di gnyis kyi rang bzhin ci zhig yin zhe na /

analyzed: ma chags // 'di @215a * //

original: gnyis ni ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yod na /
analyzed: gnyis ni ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yod na /

analyzed: 'phags rigs / ma chags pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /

analyzed: de dag kyang ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yin no //

original: de dag las /
analyzed: de dag las /

analyzed: gsum ni chog shes bdag nyid do // dang po'i gsum ni chog shes pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
